title: Impact of Arena Backgrounds on NCAA Basketball Shooting Performance
description: Analyzing multi-season NCAA Division I shot-chart data (2021–2025) to study how arena backgrounds (wall vs. stands) affect shooting. Collaboration with Greg Appelbaum and OptiLab.

title: NBA Championship Predictor
description: Developed machine-learning models using past NBA seasons and statistics; applied feature engineering and hyperparameter optimization to predict championship winners.

title: League of Legends Vision Score Analysis
description: Performed missingness analysis and hypothesis testing on esports data; trained a Random Forest (via Grid Search) to predict team vision scores.

title: San Diego Bus Routes
description: Built a Python/pandas tool to compute shortest routes between bus stops across San Diego using graph algorithms.

title: Image Processing App
description: Implemented image transformations (grayscale, brightness, chroma keying) and classified day vs. night images using KNN in Python.

title: GroceryDB Price–Protein Visualization
description: Visualization of price-per-calorie vs. protein bins across major grocery stores.

title: Portfolio Website (This Site)
description: HTML,CSS, JS, and GitHub API integration.

title: Logistic Regression Sentiment Classifier
description: Built and evaluated a logistic regression text classifier; ROC/AUC and calibration checks.

title: UPDRS Clinical Modeling (Capstone Mini)
description: Explored relationships between UPDRS metrics and post-diagnosis outcomes; regression + visualization.
